prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A man with short dark hair and a calm demeanor stands outdoors, speaking with expressive energy as he turns his head gently from front to side and back again. He wears a crisp white collared shirt beneath a sleek black jacket, the fabric slightly shifting with his relaxed movements. His mouth opens wide in animated speech, lips moving fluidly as he articulates each word with clear intent. As he begins facing forward, he slowly tilts his head toward his right shoulder, maintaining a composed posture while continuing to speak. His left hand rises slightly, palm open and fingers loosely spread, as if gesturing to emphasize a point. Then, with a smooth motion, he returns his gaze to the front, his expression warm and engaged. The background is softly blurred, suggesting an open public space under diffused daylight, perhaps near a plaza or event venue. Natural light bathes his face evenly, highlighting his composed yet lively presence. His shoulders remain relaxed throughout, and his breathing appears steady, matching the unhurried rhythm of his speech. The camera holds steady at chest level, capturing his upper body and subtle hand gestures as he communicates with quiet confidence and expressive ease.

His right hand twists violently, fingers contorted into broken, fragmented shapes, trembling uncontrollably as if glitching through reality. His left arm spasms erratically, jerking sideways without rhythm or intent. He wears a corrupted version of a white collared shirt beneath a black jacket — the fabric ripples unnaturally, tearing at the seams, with edges dissolving into jagged artifacts. The background is a chaotic collage of grainy textures, striped patterns, and flickering noise, devoid of coherent space or depth. Lighting is harsh, unnatural, and inconsistent — casting extreme shadows and overblown highlights that bleach his features while plunging others into darkness. The camera lurches unpredictably, cutting abruptly between angles, zooming in and out with violent jolts, framing him off-center or partially cropped. Every motion is staccato and disjointed — head turns snap violently rather than glide, posture collapses into unnatural stiffness or collapse, gestures are spasmodic and meaningless. The overall scene is an unrealistic 3D animation rendered with low-quality compression, heavy grain, extreme contrast, oversharpened edges, and embedded logos or text overlays. No harmony exists between voice, face, or body — only dissonance, distortion, and digital decay.
